ProductIdsProperties.description: A collection of product ids as a common set

EntityId.description: The (base) product Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying the (base not variant) product e.g Product_Retail247_123456

EntityType.description: The type of the product the EntityId references e.g ProductVariant

ProductId.description: The (base) product Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying the (base not variant) product e.g Product_Retail247_123456

ProductKey.description: The (base) product number (native form like SKU), identifying the (base not variant) product e.g 123456

ProductVariantId.description: The (variant) product Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying the (base not variant) product Often the base [ProductId]_[VariantPart] where variant part can be for example a native key, a size code etc e.g ProductVariant_Retail247_123456789_32R

ProductVariantKey.description: The (variant) product number (native form like SKU), identifying the (base not variant) product e.g 123456789_32R

ProductVariantKeyType.description: The (variant) product number (native form like SKU), identifying the (base not variant) product  e.g 123456789

SKU.description: The SKU of the product e.g 123456789

EAN.description: The EAN (a type of barcode, but here in explicit form) of the product e e.g 5059595842972

UPC.description: The UPC (a type of barcode, but here in explicit form) of the product e.g 85059595842972

Barcode.description: The barcode of the product e.g 869893435059595842972

Barcodes.description: A collection (array) of barcodes where 1 or more in array form

ItemOptionNumber.description: The item option number of the product e.g 1111111
